page.title: 09INDUSTRIAL LOCATION
page.content: There is both{manufacturing industry on Severnside and{warehousing}in the trading estate. The main reasons for their location include the following: a. the M5 motorway for quick and easy transport; b. flat land for building; c. the nearby ports of Avonmouth and Portbury for import/exports; d. the nearby workforce of Bristol and other towns. Industries include the manufacture of {chemicals, metals, acid, fertilizers and{animal feedstuffs.}There is a wide variety of companies using the trading estate for{warehousing}and {distribution,}including Rank Xerox, Do-It-All, Marks and Spencer, Birds Eye Frozen Foods and M.F.I. The{Sewage Works}came on line in 1966, and next door is the{Refuse {Incinerator.} St. Bedes School
